trans-unit.source: Provides a description of modifications done to entities by operations returned in a <xref href="System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma descrição das alterações efetuadas para as entidades por operações devolvidas num <xref href="System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.SaveChanges%2A> method returns a <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse> object that contains a series of <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.OperationResponse> objects, each of which contains a sequence of <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.EntityDescriptor> or LinkDescriptor instances that represent persisted changes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.SaveChanges%2A>método devolve um <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse>objeto que contém uma série de <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.OperationResponse>objetos, cada um dos quais contém uma sequência de <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.EntityDescriptor>ou instâncias de LinkDescriptor que representam alterações persistentes.</xref:System.Data.Services.Client.EntityDescriptor> </xref:System.Data.Services.Client.OperationResponse> </xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse> </xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.SaveChanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: For successful operations, the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.EntityDescriptor.State%2A> property of the descriptor is set to unchanged and the new values for insert and update operations are merged according to the merge settings.
trans-unit.target: Para operações com êxito, o <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.EntityDescriptor.State%2A>o descritor de propriedade é definido como inalterado e os novos valores para inserir e as operações de atualização são intercaladas, de acordo com as definições de intercalação.</xref:System.Data.Services.Client.EntityDescriptor.State%2A>

trans-unit.source: For operations with errors, the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.EntityDescriptor.State%2A> of the descriptor will remain the same as they were before <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.SaveChanges%2A> was called.
trans-unit.target: Para operações com erros, o <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.EntityDescriptor.State%2A>do descritor de permanecer o mesmo que se encontravam antes <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.SaveChanges%2A>foi chamado.</xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.SaveChanges%2A> </xref:System.Data.Services.Client.EntityDescriptor.State%2A>

trans-unit.source: If an error occurred and processing stopped during an operation, the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.EntityDescriptor.State%2A> will remain unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Se Ocorreu um erro e o processamento parado durante uma operação, o <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.EntityDescriptor.State%2A>não serão alterados.</xref:System.Data.Services.Client.EntityDescriptor.State%2A>

trans-unit.source: A source entity in a link returned by a <xref href="System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma entidade de origem numa ligação devolvida por uma <xref href="System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The identifier property of the source entity in a link returned by a <xref href="System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade identificador da entidade de origem numa ligação devolvida por uma <xref href="System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The string identifier of an identity property in a source entity.
trans-unit.target: O identificador de cadeia de uma propriedade de identidade de uma entidade de origem.

trans-unit.source: The source entity in a link returned by a <xref href="System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A entidade de origem numa ligação devolvida por uma <xref href="System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse"> </xref>.
